synopsis.text: Illyasviel von Einzbern is an ordinary schoolgirl living a normal life, harboring a secret crush on her brother Shirou. Her world is turned upside down when the magical wand Ruby, originally assigned to sorceress Rin Tohsaka, chooses Illya as its new master. Rin was tasked by the powerful mage Zelretch to collect seven legendary Class Cards containing heroic spirits. Now, reluctantly supervised by Rin, Illya must take on this dangerous mission and learn to wield her new magical girl powers. Along the way, Illya gains a friend and rival - Miyu, bonded to Rin's rival Luvia's wand Sapphire. With the fate of the Class Cards at stake, Illya and Miyu must put aside their differences and work together, overcoming menacing rivals and their own insecurities. Through her adventures, Illya hopes to not only complete her mission, but also gain the confidence to confess her true feelings. However, controlling such powerful magic as a novice will prove harder than she ever imagined.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
